Honestly KSP just isn't a mobile game. It's too large, too complex and too difficult to create. Even with the tools of the PC we still struggle to make our creations work; so why should something on a phone work? Not to mention, KSP will continue to expand at the same speed phones do meaning you may be able to run the current version of KSP on a phone from 5 years from now, but by then the game will have grown continuously too large for the mobile phone.

Even then; the controls would be too simple and you wouldn't get the info or response you need. Probably what would work best, is to create a standalone in flight controllers for planes, EVA-ing Kerbals or creating/viewing vessels from the SPH/VAB. Or, lastly, view your current Tech Tree/Mission Control/Tracking Station, Administration Building and so on. It should work alongside with the real KSP as again, any mobile version would be significantly inferior. Just imagine the KSP console version, but worse.
